_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: PocketMine-MP
author: benjiknolle@gmail.com
description: This is a PocketMin-MP Software with fixed Issues & Custom Plugins that are good for your server

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt-get update
apt-get install -y git curl wget jq file tar unzip zip

mkdir -p /mnt/server/

cd /mnt/server || exit 1

ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && printf "amd64" || printf "arm64")

VERSION="${VERSION:-PM5}"
VERSION="${VERSION^^}"

if [ ! -d "bin" ]; then
    wget https://github.com/lokiPM/PterodactylEggFixer/releases/download/PocketMine-MP/PHP.zip
    unzip PHP.zip
    chmod +rwx bin/
    chmod +rwx bin/php7
    chmod +rwx bin/php7/bin
    chmod +rwx bin/php7/bin/php
    echo "PHP Installation Done!"
fi

rm -rf PHP.zip

version=$(wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lokiPM/PterodactylEggFixer/refs/heads/main/PocketMine-MP/version)
wget "https://github.com/pmmp/PocketMine-MP/releases/download/$version/PocketMine-MP.phar"

[[ ! -f server.properties ]] && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/game_eggs/minecraft/bedrock/pocketmine_mp/server.properties

touch banned-ips.txt banned-players.txt ops.txt white-list.txt server.log
mkdir -p players worlds plugins resource_packs
